main event: Witnesses reported seeing a peculiar light phenomenon in South Zanesville, Ohio on July 11, 1968.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 20 to 30 minutes, though the actual sighting lasted about 10 seconds., The observers described the object as a beam of light that appeared and disappeared., The object hovered in place and made quick maneuvers before disappearing behind trees., Witnesses were able to notice unusual movements in grass and leaves that seemed connected to the light., A letter from the Air Force indicated that the sighting would be investigated further by Project Blue Book.
witness description: two observers who noticed peculiar movements and a light phenomenon
